headline: Fraud Detection and Prevention Market worth $65.68 billion by 2030 | MarketsandMarkets™
summary: According to MarketsandMarkets™, the global Fraud Detection and Prevention Market is projected to grow from USD 32.00 billion in 2025 to USD 65.68 billion by 2030 at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 15.5% during the forecast period.

headline: Personal Loans for Bad Credit Guaranteed Approval – RadCred Brings Same Day Funding to U.S. Borrowers
summary: RadCred offers guaranteed approval personal loans for bad credit with same-day funding, helping U.S. borrowers get fast, reliable access to emergency cash.Glendale, California, July 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Fintech marketplace RadCred today unveiled a streamlined platform that delivers personal loans for bad credit with guaranteed approval often funded within hours without a hard credit check. By analysing real-time income and bank-deposit data instead of rigid FICO thresholds, RadCred opens

headline: Conestoga Smid Cap Composite Decided to Sell Fair Isaac Corp. (FICO) in Q2
summary: Conestoga Capital Advisors, an asset management company, released its second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The second quarter began with a historically poor start, but gained momentum later as tariff fears subsided and market volatility dropped precipitously. Conestoga Smid Cap Composite underperformed the Russell 2500 Growth Index in the quarter […]

headline: Fair Isaac: Watching The Moat While The Market Revalues Risk
